entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a skilled wizard who is trying to find Harry Potter for Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the one who is giving orders to Snape and is confident that they will succeed in their mission.

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: Nagini is a snake that is being protected by some sort of spell, and Harry is trying to think of a way to penetrate the protection surrounding her.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the one who is hiding in midair and is being sought by Snape for Voldemort.

relationships.description: Snape is working for Voldemort, as evident from the conversation between them where Snape is trying to find Harry Potter for his lord.
Snape is seeking Harry Potter, as he is trying to find him for Voldemort.
